ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] ...but it's still easier than playing a rogue
ygData.msgSnippet: I know its crazy!  I left Kunark to get my 26th level song and picked up the 27th level song as well just in case figuring that would hold me for at least a
ygData.messageBody:
I know its crazy! I left Kunark to get my 26th level song and picked up the
27th level song as well just in case figuring that would hold me for at
least a month. Its a week and a bit later and I'm trying to figure out how
to get my level 28 song! At least I don't have any big rush to buy the
lousy 29th level song.

Kit


*Grin* Aren't we all just SO into Kunark.
The only reason I've left since it opened was
to buy spellS! And that for as little time as was necessary
to do that.
